title: Food Preservation in Timor-Leste - Canning and Drying Foods Quiz

questions.question: What is the main purpose of food preservation?
choices: To extend the shelf life of foods
To change the flavor of foods
To make foods more difficult to prepare
To increase the moisture content of foods
questions.answer: To extend the shelf life of foods

questions.question: Canning and drying are particularly useful food preservation methods in Timor-Leste due to:
choices: The high cost of fresh produce

questions.question: Which of the following fruits is suitable for preservation in Timor-Leste?
Green beans are an example of a vegetable that can be preserved through canning or drying in Timor-Leste.
Canning preserves food by:
choices: Sealing food in airtight containers and heating to destroy microorganisms
Freezing food at very low temperatures
Adding large amounts of sugar or salt to food
questions.answer: Sealing food in airtight containers and heating to destroy microorganisms

questions.question: What are the two main types of canning?
choices: Water bath canning and pressure canning
questions.answer: Water bath canning and pressure canning

questions.question: High-acid foods are suitable for water bath canning.
Botulism is a potential risk associated with improper canning practices.
What is the purpose of removing air bubbles during the canning process?
choices: To prevent the jars from breaking during processing
To ensure even distribution of flavors
To make the jars easier to open later
To speed up the cooling process
questions.answer: To prevent the jars from breaking during processing

questions.question: Canned foods should be stored in a cool, dry place.
Drying preserves food by:
choices: Removing moisture to inhibit microbial growth
Changing the color of the food
questions.answer: Removing moisture to inhibit microbial growth

questions.question: What are the two main methods of drying food?
Solar drying is preferable to traditional sun drying because it:
choices: Protects food from contaminants and pests
Takes longer to dry the food
Is only suitable for drying meats
questions.answer: Protects food from contaminants and pests

questions.question: Foods should be blanched before drying to preserve color and texture.
Dried foods should be stored in airtight containers in a dry, cool place.

Food preservation methods can help reduce food waste.
Selling preserved foods could be a potential source of income for Timorese families.
What is one challenge for implementing canning and drying in Timor-Leste?
choices: Lack of suitable foods for preservation

questions.question: Proper food preservation practices are important for:
choices: Ensuring food safety and preventing foodborne illnesses
Reducing the nutritional value of foods
Making foods more difficult to prepare and consume
Increasing the environmental impact of food production
questions.answer: Ensuring food safety and preventing foodborne illnesses

questions.question: Implementing food preservation methods like canning and drying can contribute to:
choices: Improving food security and self-sufficiency in Timor-Leste
Discouraging the consumption of fresh produce
Limiting the variety of foods in the Timorese diet
questions.answer: Improving food security and self-sufficiency in Timor-Leste

questions.question: Canning and drying are complementary food preservation methods that can be used together to:
choices: Maximize the benefits of food preservation
Reduce the shelf life of preserved foods
questions.answer: Maximize the benefits of food preservation
